node_REMOTE_25380 module¶

node module¶

Module used to represent a node in the network. All the node logic is inside this module

__init__(id_node, config)[source]¶

__init__.

Parameters

  • id_node – identifier of the node

add_destination(destination: str, path: list, next_hop: str, policy_value=0, share=False) → None[source]¶

add_destination. Function used to add a destination to the node not already in route format

Parameters

  • destination (str) – destination to share

  • path (list) – List of nodes attraversed to reach the destination

  • next_hop (str) – Id of the next hop node

  • policy_value – Policy value to add to the route, defualt=0

  • share – Sharing flag, default=True, if false the route will be added but not shared

Return type

None

add_neighbor(link)[source]¶

Add a neighbor to the set of neighbors If the neighbor is already in the set it throws an error and terminate

Parameters

link – link that has to be added

evaluate_signaling_event.

Evaluate a signaling event and returns the event associated with the sigaling

Parameters

  • elem (str) – signal to manage

  • route (Route) – Route to share or withdraw

Return type

Event

Raises

ValueError – When is passed an element that is not a valid signal

force_share_dst. Function used as kick starter for nodes that have to share a destination to generate the start events.

new_network(route: route.Route, event: event.Event, share=True) → None[source]¶

new_network. Function used to add a new route, it will be evaluated for the insertion in the rib and it will be then evaluated for the Routing table

Parameters

  • route (Route) – Route to evaluate

  • event (Event) – Cause event for the evaluation

  • share – The network should be shared if it’s the new best? (default=True)

Return type

None

program_withdraw(event)[source]¶

program_withdraw. Function used to program a withdraw of a previusly shared destination

Parameters

event – event that generates the withdraw, used to

get the delay time and the route that needs to be withdrawed

reannounce_handler(event)[source]¶

Reannouncement function used to redistributed a route that was withdrawed before

Parameters

event – event that triggered the reannouncement

rx_pkt(event)[source]¶

recept. Function to handle packet reception

Parameters

event – receiving event that triggered the reception

send_msg_to_all(packet: packet.Packet, event: event.Event) → None[source]¶

send_msg_to_all. Function to send a packet to all the neighbours. The packet will be sent only if the route respect the policy value of the link and if the neighbour is not the next hop of the route

Parameters

  • packet (Packet) – Packet to send

  • event (Event) – Cause event

Return type

None

share_dst(event)[source]¶

share_dst. Share a destiantion to all the neighbors If the destination is originated by this node and the withdraw flag is active a withdraw will also be triggered

Parameters

event – event that triggered the sharing of the destination

state.
